original_text: If the whole body were an eye, where would the sense of hearing be? If the whole body were an ear, where would the sense of smell be?
korean_text: 만일 온 몸이 눈이면 듣는 곳은 어디며 온 몸이 듣는 곳이면 냄새 맡는 곳은 어디냐

sentences.original_text: If the whole body were an eye,
where would the sense of hearing be?
If the whole body were an ear,
where would the sense of smell be?
